column1: Local Foods////Time two: roast beef sandwich with a side of posole. I really liked the roast beef but wish I had ordered it sans kale (not a fan.) The horseradish mayo was really good. The posole was what really stole the show - YUM! Everything about it was delightful
column2: especially whatever seed was in there (pumpkin? sunflower? I have no idea but I loved it.)
